Text.Page:
We're sending you in to pacify the Vale of the Reaper. Get your gear ready.

Kill {@LinkCreature:45#2001#argonomorph blood fiends}, {@LinkCreature:45#2002#horntoads}, and {@LinkCreature:45#2003#frogmasters}.

Report to {@Creature:245#1002$$Orheno} at Field Base Tenacity when your mission is complete.
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
